titleStmt.title: The rambling justice, or, The jealous husbands with the humours of Sir John Twiford : as it is acted at the Theatre Royal / by John Leanerd.
titleStmt.author: Leanerd, John, fl. 1679.
Leanerd, John, fl. 1679. Rambling justice.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627. More dissemblers besides women.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. F. for Thomas Quell and James Vade ...,

notesStmt.note: In part from Middleton's "More dissemblers besides women."

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
